https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iffLhhLtTNODIiCbrIxQMtQjkNS.jpg In 17th century Spain Diego Alatriste, a brave and heroic soldier, is fighting in his King's army in the Flandes region. His best mate, Balboa, falls in a trap and, near to death, asks Diego to look after his son and teach him to be a soldier. Alatriste
